metadata.description: Curated skills and commands for AI coding agents. Works across Claude Code, OpenCode, Codex, and Amp.

plugins.name: dev-browser
plugins.description: Browser automation with persistent page state. Navigate websites, fill forms, take screenshots, extract data, and test web apps. Supports standalone Chromium or connecting to your existing Chrome session.

plugins.name: frontend-design
plugins.description: Create distinctive, production-grade frontend interfaces that avoid generic AI aesthetics. Build web components, landing pages, dashboards, and applications with exceptional design quality.

plugins.name: web-perf
plugins.description: Analyze web performance using Chrome DevTools MCP. Measure Core Web Vitals (FCP, LCP, TBT, CLS), identify render-blocking resources, and optimize page load performance.

plugins.name: beads
plugins.description: Graph-based issue tracker that survives conversation compaction. Track complex multi-session work with dependencies, priorities, and audit trails persisted in git.

plugins.name: ship
plugins.description: Create a SHIP.md document - a concrete plan for finishing a project. Analyzes the codebase, defines done, and breaks work into phases with small actionable steps.

plugins.name: create-plan
plugins.description: Generate concise, actionable implementation plans for coding tasks. Outputs a structured checklist with scope, action items, and open questions.

plugins.name: solveit
plugins.description: Generate structured learning guides using the Polya problem-solving method. Creates self-contained Markdown documents that guide users through building features themselves.

plugins.name: guide
plugins.description: Interactive teaching mode that guides users to complete tasks themselves through Socratic questioning and graduated hints, rather than doing the work for them.

plugins.name: skill-creator
plugins.description: Guide for creating effective agent skills. Use when building new skills that extend Claude's capabilities with specialized knowledge, workflows, or tool integrations.

plugins.name: ask-questions-if-underspecified
plugins.description: Clarify requirements before implementing. Ask focused questions to avoid wrong work when requirements are ambiguous.
